header.title: Do you use Message to administration? | Sámi University of Applied Sciences

body.p: Do you use Message to administration?

We get a lot of messages by our "Message to administration". This is an easy and good way to getting in contact with us. But, when you use this service, you must leave an adress for us to reply. Write your adress, e-mail or what ever in the same box as your message. Completely anonymous communications are difficult to answer .
